page.title: 13EASTRIGGS HOLIDAYS
page.content: 635 questionnaires distributed, 1 to each Eastriggs house. 130 returned, about 1 in 5. Of the 130 replies, 29 families did not leave Eastriggs for a holiday last year and 101 families did. Of these 101 families, 11 spent their holiday in Dumfries & Galloway, 28 went elsewhere in Scotland, and 43 had a holiday in the United Kingdom, but outside Scotland. 19 families had a holiday outside the United Kingdom, 17 in Europe and 2 elsewhere. The 17 European holidays were spent in: Germany (3); Yugoslavia (2); Austria (2); Spain (2); France, Italy, Portugal, Netherlands, Corfu, Malta and Guernsey (1 each). One family visited Switzerland, Netherlands, Germany, Denmark, Sweden & Norway. The other 2 families visited Tenerife & Australia.
